content.title: Assign Action to Segment
content.body:
1. From the top-right corner of the Action Editor canvas, select Design View.
  2. From the Action Editor left menu, navigate to CLIENT > Show Alert.
  3. Provide the following details in the right pane:
    • Alert Type: Info
    • Alert Title: Segment Row Clicked!
    • Yes Label: OK
    • Message Type: Expression
    • Alert Message: "You have clicked Row:"+this.view.employeeSegment.selectedRowIndex
  4. Click Save.
